title: Disconnecting every time during loading screen internet is fine
body: Like the the title said I keep Disconnecting in my loading screen, it just happened recently,internet is fine, I already have a afk penalty and lose a ranked game twice plsssss fix this or help me.

replies.body:
Before you start hopping back into normal or ranked queues, let's troubleshoot that network to make sure everything is still working properly. I don't want you getting more penalties for this, so make sure you test this out in a custom/practice game. 

This might just be a hiccup with your connection to our servers specifically, which it isn't entirely uncommon for your ISP to have problems routing your connection to certain servers. For example, it's pretty common for people to be able to access Google or Youtube but not be able to connect to game servers like ours or Blizzards. 

Check out your network settings while following this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Do pay extra attention to the steps on port forwarding and how to configure your DNS settings, but do hit every step in that guide to be sure you cover all your bases.
